org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power

Class MyPowerHarddriveStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.HarddriveStorage
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.MyHarddriveStorage
        • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power.MyPowerHarddriveStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storage

    public class MyPowerHarddriveStorage
extends MyHarddriveStorage
    MyPowerHarddriveStorage enables simulation of power-aware Hard drives.
    Author:
    Baptiste Louis
